parameters.name: UpdateAllConfigs
parameters.description: True to update all configurations, false to not

parameters.name: UnlockConfigs
parameters.description: True to unlock configurations, false to not

title: IFeature.MoveFreezeBarTo2
description: Moves the freeze bar to the specified location in the FeatureManager design tree.
signature:
System.Int32 MoveFreezeBarTo2( 
   System.Int32
Location
,
   System.Boolean
UpdateAllConfigs
,
   System.Boolean
UnlockConfigs
)

parameters.name: UpdateAllConfigs
parameters.description: True to update all configurations, false to not

parameters.name: UnlockConfigs
parameters.description: True to unlock configurations, false to not

returns: 1 indicates that the freeze bar did not move to the specified location in the FeatureManager design tree; 0 indicates that the freeze bar did move to the specified location in the FeatureManager design tree
